attachments.title: Vim 8.2 release · vim/vim@9805653
attachments.text: The official Vim repository. Contribute to vim/vim development by creating an account on GitHub.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0efd1bdcf4891f9ef2537e4c3d50a379186dca5f|patch 8.1.2419: with a long file name the hit-enter prompt appears>
patch 8.1.2419: with a long file name the hit-enter prompt appears

Problem:    With a long file name the hit-enter prompt appears. (J. Lewis
            Muir)
Solution:   When checking for text to wrap don't do this when outputing a CR.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2419: with a long file name the hit-enter prompt appears · vim/vim@0efd1bd
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2419: with a long file name the hit-enter prompt appears · vim/vim@0efd1bd
attachments.text: Problem: With a long file name the hit-enter prompt appears. (J. Lewis Muir) Solution: When checking for text to wrap don't do this when outputing a CR.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4954019c93a2bb5a0b1af54b5961c933beeb56f4|patch 8.1.2420: crash when calling popup_close() in win_execute()>
patch 8.1.2420: crash when calling popup_close() in win_execute()

Problem:    Crash when calling popup_close() in win_execute().
Solution:   Disallow popup_close() in popup window. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto,
            closes #5345)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2420: crash when calling popup_close() in win_execute() · vim/vim@4954019
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2420: crash when calling popup_close() in win_execute() · vim/vim@4954019
attachments.text: Problem: Crash when calling popup_close() in win_execute(). Solution: Disallow popup_close() in popup window. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto, closes #5345)

patch 8.1.2421: test88 is old style

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9810cfbe554b166cb05b51119040bb4426c17bac|patch 8.1.2422: "make depend" does not work correctly for libvterm>
patch 8.1.2422: "make depend" does not work correctly for libvterm

Problem:    "make depend" does not work correctly for libvterm.
Solution:   Fix build dependencies. And a few minor improvements.

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2422: "make depend" does not work correctly for libvterm · vim/vim@9810cfb
attachments.text: Problem: "make depend" does not work correctly for libvterm. Solution: Fix build dependencies. And a few minor improvements.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e24437b643650cd51d402bd9c603f941fa0cc1a1|patch 8.1.2423: MS-Windows properties shows version as "8, 1, 0">
patch 8.1.2423: MS-Windows properties shows version as "8, 1, 0"

Problem:    MS-Windows properties shows version as "8, 1, 0".
Solution:   Use "8.1.0". (Ken Takata, closes #5342)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2423: MS-Windows properties shows version as "8, 1, 0" · vim/vim@e24437b
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2423: MS-Windows properties shows version as "8, 1, 0" · vim/vim@e24437b
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows properties shows version as "8, 1, 0". Solution: Use "8.1.0". (Ken Takata, closes #5342)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/36698e34aacee4186e6f5f87f431626752fcb337|patch 8.1.2424: MS-Windows: console buffer is resized unnecessarily>
patch 8.1.2424: MS-Windows: console buffer is resized unnecessarily

Problem:    MS-Windows: console buffer is resized unnecessarily.
Solution:   Only call ResizeConBuf() when the size differs. (Nobuhiro
            Takasaki, closes #5343)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2424: MS-Windows: console buffer is resized unnecessarily · vim/vim@36698e3
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2424: MS-Windows: console buffer is resized unnecessarily · vim/vim@36698e3
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: console buffer is resized unnecessarily. Solution: Only call ResizeConBuf() when the size differs. (Nobuhiro Takasaki, closes #5343)
